Text:
Jag gillar verkligen att det finns nån som har tänkte lite och gjort ett bättre brogram än det i windows! (fast det har ju gjorts nya liknande prgram som är bättre till typ allt i windows)

Men jag skulle gärna vilja ha ett program som hittar OCH ansluter till det snabbaste möjliga wlan som finns . Nån som vet?

is this vista compatible? Anyone know vaguely a few step by step instructions on using this tool? I already have it installed just want to know how to actually get a list of networks in my area. I have wireless ready laptop and the software just says no wireless adapter found and gps disabled.  If i need a different program or something any help would be much appreciated,

thanks.

It's ok i've found out that if your on vista you want either inSSIDer or Vistumbler and not netstumbler.  Warning: netstumbler can cause problems with vista system and cause crashes, it's not for vista or XP 64 edtion.  I've downloaded inSSIDer and it worked straight away. Also it's freeware I think so your better getting it from Metageek.
